changes.description: Added new ERROR event to EndpointTestsTraitValidator when builtin params are inconsistent
Tweak wording of integers with ranges message
Added Smithy Kotlin Quickstart and Client User Guide sections.
Update smithy-rules-engine-tests with new std lib functions and bdd-based tests
Removed protocol tests for skipping null values in dense collections. This behavior can silently drop data. SDKs that cannot preserve null values should raise an exception instead
Add new transform compileBdd and compileBddForAws
Added the `@smithy.contracts#conditions` trait, available in the new `smithy-contract-traits` package. This trait defines restrictions on shape values using JMESPath expressions.
Added a tags property to eventStreamTests to allow filtering individual cases in the same way that http protocol tests can be.
Add client guidance for context types.
Added client guidance documentation for endpoint resolution.
Added a service provider interface for `NodeValidationVisitor` plugins, and optimized to index plugins by the `ShapeType` they apply to.
